comment.author: 51971249@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/49015875@N00]  There was indeed a saxophonist named Joe Thomas who played with the Jimmie Lunceford Orchestra. But this trumpeter is Joseph Eli Thomas, who played with Art Tatum, Fats Waller, Teddy Wilson, Earl Hines and many others.

comment.author: 49015875@N00
comment._content: Thanks Larry, I only found one blog on him which did include some photos of him.
